Title: Sales Staff
Description:
Company Description
myMayz is a one-stop shop specializing in Fashion, Kitchenware, Tableware, Food, Home, and Garden essentials. With a focus on quality and variety, myMayz aims to simplify and enhance everyday life by offering products that align with individual styles and needs. Customers can explore our diverse selection and experience the myMayz difference by visiting www.mymayz.com.
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role based in Giza for a Sales Staff position. The Sales Staff will engage with customers, assist them in choosing products, provide excellent customer service, and ensure a positive shopping experience. Responsibilities include maintaining store organization, meeting sales targets, processing transactions, and staying updated on the latest product information and promotions.
Qualifications
Sales and customer service skills, including relationship building and effective upselling techniques
Communication and interpersonal skills to interact with diverse customers
Organizational skills and attention to detail for inventory management and store presentation
Product knowledge in relevant categories such as Fashion, Kitchenware, and Home essentials
Ability to work in a fast-paced retail environment and achieve sales goals
Previous experience in retail or sales roles preferred
Proficiency in using point-of-sale (POS) systems is an advantage
High school diploma or equivalent; additional certifications in sales or customer service are a plus

Title: Real Estate Agent
Description:
Company Description
Coldwell Banker New Homes, established in 2008, specializes in the brokerage of off-plan and new-build homes, catering to a growing real estate market. The company collaborates with credible developers to offer a diverse portfolio of projects across various districts and market segments. With a focus on providing integrated property services to both developers and home buyers, New Homes ensures a seamless buying process with zero commission fees. Known for its professionalism and extensive property selection, New Homes has become a trusted choice for real estate clients.
Role Description
This is a full-time, on-site role for a Real Estate Agent based in Cairo, Egypt. Responsibilities include working directly with buyers and developers to facilitate property purchase transactions, promoting off-plan and new-build properties, and providing exceptional customer service. The Real Estate Agent will assist clients in navigating the buying process, conducting property visits, and maintaining an up-to-date understanding of the real estate market to offer valuable recommendations to clients.
Qualifications
Possess a valid Real Estate License
Proven experience in Real Estate, including knowledge of real property and new-build transactions
Strong Customer Service and Sales skills
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Ability to work independently and collaboratively
Knowledge of the Cairo real estate market is a plus
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business, Real Estate, or a related field is preferred

Title: Lead Project Manager
Description:
Lead Project Manager | Full-Time |Remote| Cairo, Egypt
We are a trusted recruitment partner dedicated to connecting exceptional talent with world-class organizations. On behalf of a
leading software company based in Cairo
, we are seeking an experienced and proactive
Lead Project Manager
to oversee complex software projects, guide cross-functional teams, and drive successful delivery in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. This is a
full-time opportunity
, open to candidates based in
Cairo, Egypt
, with flexible
on-site or hybrid
work options.
About the Role
As the Lead Project Manager, you will take ownership of end-to-end project delivery â€” from planning and execution to stakeholder management and performance optimization. You will lead a team of project managers and collaborate closely with engineering, product, and design departments to ensure that all initiatives are delivered on time, within scope, and in line with business goals. This role is ideal for a strategic thinker who combines leadership, organization, and technical insight to drive excellence.
Key Responsibilities
Lead, mentor, and guide project management teams to ensure consistent delivery standards and best practices.
Oversee multiple software projects simultaneously, managing timelines, budgets, and scope.
Collaborate with product owners and stakeholders to define project goals, deliverables, and success metrics.
Identify potential risks and implement mitigation strategies to maintain smooth execution.
Serve as the primary communication bridge between leadership, technical teams, and clients.
Ensure all projects follow Agile or hybrid methodologies, depending on the project requirements.
Monitor performance and conduct regular project reviews to ensure continuous improvement.
Foster a collaborative environment that encourages innovation, accountability, and professional growth.
Qualifications
Bachelorâ€™s degree in
Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or a related field
(Masterâ€™s degree or PMP certification preferred).
Minimum
7â€“10 years of project management experience
, with at least
3 years in a leadership or senior PM role
within the software industry.
Proven track record of delivering complex software or digital transformation projects.
Deep understanding of
Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall methodologies
.
Strong leadership, problem-solving, and stakeholder management skills.
Excellent communication and presentation abilities.
Fluent in
English
; proficiency in
Arabic
is an advantage.
Whatâ€™s Offered
Full-time role based in
Cairo, Egypt
, with the flexibility to work
on-site or hybrid
.
Opportunity to lead large-scale software initiatives in a rapidly growing technology environment.
Competitive compensation package.
Supportive, collaborative, and innovation-driven workplace culture.
Professional growth and leadership development opportunities.
Apply Now
If youâ€™re a driven leader with a passion for delivering impactful software solutions and empowering teams to perform at their best, we invite you to apply and take the next step in your project management career.
Industries: Human Resources Services and Software Development

Title: Senior Sales
Description:
Company Description
Takery provides the digital and physical infrastructure necessary for businesses and communities to thrive in the on-demand age. Our platforms are designed to adapt to evolving consumer habits, aiming to foster stronger connections between businesses, customers, and communities. We focus on enabling businesses to meet contemporary demands efficiently and effectively, ensuring growth and sustainability in a rapidly changing market environment.
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Sales Cloud Kitchen position, located in Cairo, Egypt. The role involves managing daily kitchen operations, ensuring food preparation and cooking meet quality standards. Responsibilities include upholding hygiene protocols, engaging with customers, offering exceptional customer service, and communicating effectively. Collaboration with team members is essential to maintain a smooth kitchen workflow and deliver outstanding experiences to customers.
Qualifications
Proficiency in Food Preparation and Cooking, ensuring quality and adherence to standards
Strong understanding and practice of Hygiene standards and regulations
Excellent Communication and Customer Service skills to effectively interact with colleagues and clients
Teamwork and organizational capabilities to manage daily operations smoothly
Experience in a similar kitchen setting or sales-related role is a plus
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment while maintaining attention to detail
Industries: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage

Title: Laundry Attendant
Location: Sharm El Sheikh, South Sinai, Egypt
Description:
Company Description
With its stunning location at Sharm El Sheikh, Rixos Premium Seagate offers a luxurious retreat overlooking the shimmering red sea. The hotel offers an All-Inclusive concept combining exceptional restaurants and bars, top-class entertainment venues that also provide a variety of dining experiences and superb wellness and sports facilities. Rixos Premium Seagate offers stylish rooms and suites with direct access to the private beach, and state-of-the-art conference and banquet venues.
A beautiful beach, delicious food with top-quality service restaurants with luxurious buffets, pools, Rixy Club exclusively for children and live entertainment all await your ultimate holiday experience.
Rixos Premium Seagate is located 18 km from Naama Bay, 25 km from the old market of Sharm El-Sheikh and 9 km from Sharm El-Sheikh
Job Description
Protects company tools, equipment, machines, or other assets in accordance with company policies and procedures.
2 Ensures uniform, nametags, and personal appearance are clean, hygienic, professional and in compliance with company policies and procedures.
3 Performs other reasonable job duties as requested by Supervisors.
4 Supports all co-workers and treats them with dignity and respect.
5 Inspects linen and terry for damage and removes them from circulation as necessary.
6 Separates soiled articles (e.g., linen, terry, and clothing) based on color, fabric, and cleaning technique requirements prior to washing or dry cleaning.
7 Maintains accurate records of items washed, number of loads, and poundage of dry cleaning and laundry.
8 Transports cart of washed articles to dryers and place in dryers according to load size.
9 To predict that all activities and to be purchased all equipment and belongings may create disease for the environment, to join all activities which is organized to protect biological diversity and shares the responsibilities, shares the individual responsibilities in order to increase environment knowledge and to carry on necessary trainings. To provide minimum consumption currently used all stuffs and equipment (paper, printed out etc.).
10 To implement his responsibilities in order to eliminate and collect waste in a proper way, reduce environmental pollution and harmful effects to the environment.
11 To provide carrying chemicals safely, carrying, storing and using in accordance with laws, controlling reducing chemical dirtiness.
12 Carries out all responsibilities related to the quality management systems implemented at the facilities
13 Carries out all other duties assigned by managers and hotel management not specified in the job description.
Qualifications
Education: At least a primary school or vocational diploma.
ïƒ¼ Experience: At least 1 year of experience in the related field.
ïƒ¼ Foreign Language: Not expected.
ïƒ¼ Courses and Training: Prior attendance in courses and seminars in the related field. ïƒ¼ Computer Literacy: Not expected.
ïƒ¼ Skills: Adaptability/Flexibility, Stress Tolerance

Title: senior sales executive (domestic )
Description:
Company Description
Garrar is an agile and innovative land transportation company operating in the Middle East and North Africa, committed to transforming the industry with cutting-edge digitized solutions. Known for its efficient workflows, rapid service delivery, and exemplary customer service, Garrar stands out as a leader in transportation optimization. The company thrives on innovation and is driven by a dedicated team of experienced professionals and passionate staff, ensuring growth and excellence in the sector.
Job Description
This is a full-time, on-site role located in Giza for a Senior Sales Executive (Domestic). The Senior Sales Executive will be responsible for driving sales revenue by identifying potential customers, building and maintaining client relationships, and presenting appropriate transportation solutions. Responsibilities will also include negotiating contracts, meeting sales targets, contributing to strategic sales planning, and maintaining customer satisfaction to ensure repeat business and loyalty.
Qualifications
Proven experience in Sales, Business Development, and building long-term client relationships.
Strong negotiation, communication, and presentation skills to effectively engage with customers and stakeholders.
Knowledge of the transportation or logistics industry, along with the ability to identify market trends.
Proficiency in CRM tools, sales reporting, and market analysis software.
Driven, goal-oriented professional with the ability to work independently and lead sales strategies.
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or a related field; a relevant masterâ€™s degree is a plus.
Industries: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage

Title: Lead Data Analyst
Description:
Lead Data Analyst | Full-Time | Remote (Egypt)
We are a trusted recruitment partner dedicated to connecting exceptional talent with world-class organizations. On behalf of a
growing software company serving clients across global markets
, we are seeking an experienced and analytical
Lead Data Analyst
to drive data strategy, deliver actionable insights, and support data-driven decision-making. This is a
full-time remote opportunity open to candidates based in Egypt
.
About the Role
As a Lead Data Analyst, you will play a key leadership role in managing the data lifecycleâ€”from collection and analysis to visualization and reporting. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to translate complex datasets into meaningful insights that support product development, business performance, and strategic initiatives. This role is ideal for a data-driven problem solver with strong analytical thinking and experience leading data projects in fast-paced tech environments.
Key Responsibilities
Lead the design, development, and delivery of data analytics projects across the organization.
Collaborate with product, engineering, and business teams to understand data needs and deliver high-quality insights.
Build dashboards, reports, and data models to support decision-making and performance tracking.
Analyze large, complex datasets to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for optimization.
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and integrity across all sources and reporting tools.
Mentor and guide junior analysts, promoting best practices and analytical excellence.
Develop and document data processes, analysis methodologies, and reporting standards.
Present findings and recommendations to leadership in a clear and actionable manner.
Qualifications
Bachelorâ€™s degree in
Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field
.
5+ years of experience
in data analytics or business intelligence, including experience leading analytics initiatives.
Strong proficiency in
SQL
, data visualization tools (e.g.,
Power BI, Tableau, Looker
), and analytics platforms.
Experience with
Python or R
for statistical analysis and data processing.
Solid understanding of data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
Strong communication skills with the ability to simplify complex data for non-technical audiences.
Experience working in a
software or technology-driven environment
is highly preferred.
Fluency in
English
is required.
Whatâ€™s Offered
Full-time
remote role
open to professionals located anywhere in
Egypt
.
Opportunity to lead data analytics initiatives for a high-growth software company.
Competitive compensation package.
Collaborative, innovative, and supportive work culture.
Clear opportunities for professional development and advancement.
Apply Now
If you are a data-focused leader with a passion for transforming information into strategic value, we invite you to apply and play a key role in shaping data excellence within the organization.
Industries: Staffing and Recruiting and Software Development

Title: Product manager| Pharmaceutical company| Gynaecology line
Description:
Job Responsibilities:
â€¢ Develop and execute marketing plans and strategies.
â€¢ Conduct market research and competitive analysis to Identify new opportunities.
â€¢ Manage the launch and promotion of new products.
â€¢ Collaborate with the sales team to provide training, support and marketing tools.
â€¢ Monitor product performance and market trends, adjusting strategies as needed.
â€¢ Work closely with medical and regulatory teams to ensure compliance with industry standards.
â€¢ Build strong relationships with key opinion leaders (KOLs) and healthcare professionals.
â€¢ Manage budgeting and forecasting for assigned products.
Requirements:
â€¢ Minimum 1-2 years of experience as a Product Manager.
â€¢ Good relationships with Gynecologist, maternity hospitals and IVF doctors
â€¢ Proven success in new product launches is a plus.
â€¢ Bachelor's degree in Pharmacy, Veterinary Medicine, or Science.
â€¢ Holding an MBA or Marketing Diploma is an advantage.
â€¢ Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills.
â€¢ Highly energetic, proactive, and results-driven.
Apply Now
Send your CV on hr@splendidpharma.com
with the subject line: Product Manager - your specialty
Join Splendid Pharma and be part of a growing, innovative, and people-centric pharmaceutical company.

Title: Business  Development Specialist
Description:
A Multi National company for Trading & Investment, looking for a "Business Marketing Researcher"
- Location: Giza
- Working hours: 8:00 to 4:30
- Days off: 2 Days
Position Summary:
The position assists the managers of the Business and Marketing Department in:
Industrial materials trading (mainly importing), and new business development, including startups, infrastructure, and mobility sectors.
Representing MC in the Egyptian market, this role involves maintaining and developing market presence and identifying potential new business opportunities.
The candidate will maintain active relationships with customers, suppliers, partners, and government authorities, in alignment with  business strategy.
Key Accountabilities:
â€¢ Conduct market intelligence gathering and analysis through visits, meetings, and media sources.
â€¢ Identify and develop new business opportunities in relevant sectors.
â€¢ Support ongoing business through engagement with local partners, suppliers, and customers.
â€¢ Prepare relevant reports and meeting summaries in a timely manner.
â€¢ Perform other related tasks as required.
Qualifications and Requirements:
â€¢ Education: Bachelorâ€™s Degree
â€¢ Work Experience: 2â€“3 years in a similar role, preferably in an international environment
â€¢ Languages: Fluent in English and Arabic
â€¢ Skills:
o Strong interpersonal, communication, and collaboration skills
o Learning and growth mindset
o Ability to work under pressure
o Proficient in MS Office
o Problem-solving skills
â€¢ Preferred:
o Market knowledge of industrial materials, infrastructure, and mobility
o Familiarity with trading terms (import, payment, Incoterms, etc.)
o Resident in Cairo or Giza
o Fulfilled or exempted from military service
If you're interested, send your CV to WhatsApp: 01228283222. Mention the title + your expected salary

Title: Full Stack Engineer
Description:
ROLE:
The role of Lead Developer at Augustus Media is to manage the development team, analyze project requirements, plan tasks to meet deadlines and oversee the company products making sure theyâ€™re always fully functional and meet internal/external expectations.
The ideal candidate should possess strong expertise in PHP and NodeJS frameworks such as Laravel and Express, along with proficiency in CMS platforms like WordPress and frontend frameworks such as Vue.js. They should also demonstrate excellent time management skills and the ability to handle tasks efficiently and independently.
The ability to collaborate and work as a team player is essential. Knowledge of cloud services like AWS and Google Cloud is a plus, and familiarity with React, Angular, Nuxt is advantageous.
SKILLS :
A degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent is preferred.
Proven 3+ years experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role with a strong portfolio.
Advanced proficiency in
PHP frameworks
(Laravel) and
CMS platforms
(WordPress).
Expertise in
Node.js frameworks
, particularly
Express.js
.
Familiarity with React, Angular, and Nuxt is a plus.
Ability to refactor code, work with design patterns, algorithms, and microservices patterns.
Strong time management and task management skills.
Commitment to meeting project deadlines and delivering high-quality work.
Strong teamwork and communication skills.
Cloud services knowledge, especially AWS and Google Cloud, is beneficial.
Hands-on experience with
SQL
and
NoSQL databases
such as
MySQL
and
MongoDB
, including database planning and optimization.
RESPONSIBILITIES :
Develop high-quality web applications using Laravel, WordPress, and Vue.js.
Lead and mentor fellow development team members, providing guidance and support.
Analyze project requirements and plan development tasks.
Ensure projects are completed on time and within scope.
Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers, designers, and other stakeholders.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging technologies.
Knowledge of cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud) and the ability to integrate them into projects
Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones & responsiveness of applications
Designing and developing APIs
must communicate with agility, work in a fast-paced environment, and remain comfortable working across backgrounds.
writing Technical and End-user documentation.
Benefits:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
A collaborative and innovative work environment.
The chance to work on exciting and diverse projects.
Access to the latest technologies and tools.
PEOPLE :
Assist in fostering a high performance led culture
Bring along a positive, collaborative, ready to learn attitude at all times
Develop SMART performance objectives alongside your line manager
Promoting Augustus as a great place to work, ensuring positivity is championed and your team feels prepared to live out the 3 core values
PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT
Build on your emotional intelligence and self-awareness
Grow your presence in the industry, including relationships within agency partners and industry bodies to support professional stature
Complete mandatory training
ABOUT AUGUSTUS
The consumption of media is ever present, yet the mediums and the means are ever evolving.
We are a â€˜New Mediaâ€™ company, born in one of the most dynamic and vibrant cities in the Middle East. Our vision is to establish and maintain a â€˜New Orderâ€™ of media advertising with data and content at the heart of everything we do.
Augustus is a Middle Eastern digital media company based in Dubai and Riyadh and has been designed to adapt and evolve to this perpetually changing media environment.
Our mission is to be the â€˜New Mediaâ€™ company of choice in the Middle East by generating profitable growth through innovation and breaking the mold in marketing communications.
Values
We understand that achieving our mission is based upon strong values and we have identified
three that sit right at our core.
â€¢
Ingenuity:
There is a bit of genius in everything we do. We take pride in our creative originality.
â€¢
Tenacity:
Good things come to those who work for them. We always persevere and persist.
â€¢
Velocity:
High level performance is about speed and momentum. We are fast and agile in how
we think, operate and how we act

La nostra piÃ¹ grande forza risiede nel ricco mix di cultura, talento e competenze dei nostri dipendenti. Ci impegniamo a non discriminare su qualsiasi base protetta, tra cui la disabilitÃ , lo status di veterano o altre basi protette dalla legge.
Noi di Westin ci impegniamo a offrire agli ospiti le condizioni per ritrovare il controllo e migliorare il benessere nei momenti di maggiore bisogno durante i loro viaggi, assicurando che possano sentirsi al meglio. Per realizzare la mission del brand, ovvero di diventare il marchio del wellness di punta nel settore dell'accoglienza, abbiamo bisogno di collaboratori che dimostrano passione e impegno per dare vita alla programmazione unica del brand. Title: Senior Media Buyer
Description:
Location :Sheraton -Full Time "On Site "
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Senior Media Buyer located in Cairo, Egypt. The Senior Media Buyer will be responsible for developing and executing media plans, implementing media-buying strategies, and liaising with media outlets to secure effective advertising placements. The role includes analyzing campaign performance, conducting market research, and ensuring optimal media investments. The Senior Media Buyer will collaborate with internal teams and external stakeholders to achieve client objectives and maximize return on investment.
Qualifications
Experience in Media Planning and Media Strategy is essential.
Strong Media Buying expertise, with a proven ability to negotiate and manage media purchases efficiently.
Excellent Analytical Skills and the ability to monitor campaign performance and adjust as needed.
Proficiency in communication and collaboration to work effectively with clients, media outlets, and internal teams.
Detail-oriented with the ability to manage budgets and optimize resource allocation.
Prior experience with digital and traditional media platforms is a plus.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, or a related field is preferred.
Apply For:
hr@tradinggroupegy.com

Title: Safety Engineer
Description:
Willingness to travel and work in Jeddah is a mandatory requirement for this role.
We are a trusted recruitment partner supporting leading organizations across the region in attracting top engineering and technical talent. On behalf of a well-established partner based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, we are seeking an experienced
Safety Engineer
to join their team and support ongoing infrastructure projects.
About the Role
The selected candidate will be responsible for ensuring full safety compliance across project sites. This role requires strong technical expertise, validated safety certifications, and extensive hands-on experience in safety and security operations within large-scale infrastructure environments.
Key Responsibilities
Implement, monitor, and enforce safety and security procedures across project sites.
Ensure compliance with local regulations, international safety standards, and company policies.
Conduct risk assessments, site inspections, and incident investigations.
Deliver safety inductions, training sessions, and ongoing guidance to project teams.
Prepare and maintain safety reports, records, and compliance documentation.
Work closely with engineering and project teams to promote and maintain a safe working environment.
Requirements
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Engineering (mandatory).
Minimum of 7 years of experience in safety engineering or safety/security roles.
Verified safety certificates issued by previous employers.
Proven experience working on infrastructure projects.
Strong knowledge of safety regulations and industry best practices.
Willingness to travel and work across project locations, including Jeddah.
Whatâ€™s Offered
Company-provided accommodation.
Residence permit (Iqama).
Medical insurance.
Competitive salary package based on experience.

Title: Sales Desk Associate
Description:
The LSEG is rapidly growing its footprint in Cairo to maintain deep customer relationships to drive revenue retention and growth.
We are looking for a fresh graduate to join our Sales Desk Associate Team to provide administrative support to our account management team in EMEA â€“ spanning across various customer segments.
What Youâ€™ll Do:
Ensure all client administrative tasks are fulfilled.
Work with customer operations team to help with deal execution and support.
Understand key client objectives and supports account planning.
Identify additional opportunities for revenue and proactively.
Know required information about the industry, domain, and target personas.
Collaborate closely with internal stakeholders, e.g., relationship managers, sales teams, legal, and order management to support client scenarios.
Own and maintain data hygiene in pipeline for select data fields.
Support on annual price increase process.
Adhere to financial controls and policies, running third-party data responsibly.
Resolve inquiries effectively, performing thorough analyses to address root causes.
Drive data and documentation accuracy across an allocated account portfolio: e.g., locate, verify, and review client contract documentation to ensure completeness and accuracy.
Handle diverse order types, ensuring accurate system entries and fulfilment in a timely and accurate manner.
What Weâ€™re Looking For:
Solid understanding of the financial services industry.
University degree or equivalent work experience University degree or equivalent work experience.
Industry certifications encouraged.
Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
Ability to prioritize and handle multiple tasks in a deadline-driven environment.
Problem solving skills: ability to understand, articulate, structure and solve client needs
Relationship building skills.
What We Offer:
We're proud to offer a working culture that supports growth, balance, and purpose:
Hybrid and flexible working arrangements.
A welcoming, inclusive culture backed by Employee Networks.
A competitive referral bonus program.
Access to private healthcare, wellness support, and pension contributions.
Professional development opportunities and learning resources.
Paid volunteer time to support causes that matter to you.
A team that values your input and supports your goals.
We believe diversity makes us stronger. If you need reasonable accommodations during the application or interview process, please let us know - we're here to support you!
Career Stage:
Senior Associate
London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) Information:
Join us and be part of a team that values innovation, quality, and continuous improvement. If you're ready to take your career to the next level and make a significant impact, we'd love to hear from you.
LSEG is a leading global financial markets infrastructure and data provider. Our purpose is driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth.
Our purpose is the foundation on which our culture is built. Our values of
Integrity, Partnership
,
Excellence
and
Change
underpin our purpose and set the standard for everything we do, every day. They go to the heart of who we are and guide our decision making and everyday actions.
Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 65 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce.
We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyoneâ€™s race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs.
You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas. We are committed to sustainability across our global business and we are proud to partner with our customers to help them meet their sustainability objectives. Our charity, the LSEG Foundation provides charitable grants to community groups that help people access economic opportunities and build a secure future with financial independence. Colleagues can get involved through fundraising and volunteering.
LSEG offers a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives.
Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) (we) may hold about you, what itâ€™s used for, and how itâ€™s obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject.
If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to LSEG are aware of this privacy notice.
Industries: IT Services and IT Consulting and Financial Services

Title: Expert engagement associate
Description:
Company Overview
Silverlight Expert Research Network is a UK-based consultancy that connects organizations with senior industry professionals across global markets. We support businesses with expert interviews, market research, and data-driven insights that guide strategic decision-making.
Role Summary
We are looking for an Expert Engagement Associate to support our research operations by sourcing, contacting, and engaging industry experts for paid research interviews. This role is target-driven and involves consistent outbound communication with professionals across various sectors.
Key Responsibilities
Conduct outbound calls to identify and engage suitable industry experts
Maintain a minimum outreach rate of 20 calls per hour
Clearly explain research opportunities and participation requirements
Screen experts based on project criteria
Secure expert confirmations and generate research credits
Log call outcomes and expert information accurately in CRM or tracking systems
Meet daily and monthly performance and credit targets
Work Schedule
Monday to Friday: 9 working hours per day (within 8:00 AM â€“ 10:00 PM)
Saturday: Off
Sunday: 4.5 hours only
Compensation
Base Salary: $300/month (full-time, target-based)
Base Salary (if targets are not met): $200/month
Commission: $10 per credit, paid in addition to base salary
Payments are made monthly via bank transfer
Requirements
Strong verbal communication skills in English
Comfortable with high-volume calling and performance targets
Ability to document information accurately
Basic computer and internet skills
Previous experience in outreach, sales, research, or CRM use is an advantage but not mandatory
What We Offer
Fully remote work opportunity
Performance-based earnings
Exposure to international consulting and research projects
Professional communication and research experience

Title: Telesales Representative
Location: Qesm El Sheikh Zaid, Al Jizah, Egypt
Description:
Sanaddak Egypt
is a rapidly growing FinTech company committed to transforming financial accessibility through an innovative and ethical micro-liquidity platform. We empower underbanked individuals by offering immediate cash liquidity using an advanced buyback model â€” all managed through our smart and user-friendly mobile application.
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for Telesales Agent, located in Qesm El Sheikh Zaid. The Telesales Specialist will be responsible for identifying and reaching out to potential customers via phone calls, delivering effective sales pitches, and closing sales. Responsibilities also include providing exceptional customer service, maintaining strong customer relationships, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Additionally, the role involves keeping accurate records of customer interactions and contributing to team sales targets through collaboration and training of new team members.
Key Responsibilities:
Conduct outbound calls to promote gold-backed micro-liquidity solutions.
Clearly articulate the value proposition and secure application process.
Identify customer needs and match them with appropriate liquidity offerings.
Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline.
Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets (KPIs).
Maintain accurate sales and customer records in the CRM system.
Collaborate with internal teams on product updates.
Professionally handle customer inquiries and objections.
Stay informed on the FinTech industry and market developments.
Participate in ongoing training for skill enhancement.
Location: Palm Hills- Elsheikh Zayed, Egypt
Qualifications:
Proven experience +1 in a telesales or inside sales role, preferably within the FinTech, financial services, or technology sector in Egypt.
Fluency in both Arabic and English is essential.
Demonstrated ability to persuade, influence, and close sales, explaining complex financial concepts simply.
Results-oriented with a strong desire to achieve and exceed sales targets.
Proficiency in using CRM software (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM) and sales productivity tools.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Resilience and a positive attitude in the face of challenges and customer objections.
What We Offer:
Competitive base salary and an attractive commission structure, rewarding your sales achievements.
Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
A vibrant, innovative, and supportive work environment where your contributions truly make a difference.
How to apply

Title: Furniture Sales
Description:
Company Description
Exact Office Solutions is a brand established by El Amira Furniture (EAF), a leading company in the manufacture, import, design, and supply of premium office and home furniture since 1984. Exact Office Solutions merges modern office furniture designs with high-quality manufacturing to address market demands. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Cairo, the company excels in crafting advanced office furniture. Serving a wide range of sectors, including governmental, public, private, and investment, the company remains dedicated to growth and contributing to the Egyptian market and economy year after year.
Role Description
This is a full-time, on-site role as a Furniture Sales Representative located in Cairo. The role involves managing retail sales of furniture, providing exceptional customer service, and building relationships with clients to meet their office and home furnishing needs. Key responsibilities include showcasing furniture pieces, consulting clients on design and product options, meeting sales targets, and maintaining a professional and welcoming showroom environment. You will also engage with other team members to ensure a seamless sales process.
Qualifications
Strong Communication skills to effectively interface with clients and understand their requirements
Background in Retail Sales and Furniture to align client needs with product offerings
Exceptional Customer Service and Sales abilities to enhance client satisfaction and drive revenue
Proactive problem-solving and organizational skills
Ability to work well in a team and establish long-term client relationships
Experience with office furniture sales
Bachelorâ€™s degree or equivalent experience in a relevant field

Title: Salesperson

This is a full-time on-site role for a Salesperson at MADU Shops Egypt. The Salesperson will be responsible for presenting product details, closing sales, and maintaining customer relationships. Additionally, the Salesperson will be expected to meet sales targets, generate reports on sales activities and attend trade shows.

Title: Senior mechanical BIM Engineer
Description:
Company Description
Competent is dedicated to providing smart and reliable HR outsourcing solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of its clients. Since its inception, the company has successfully supported over 80 clients across various industries through an emphasis on quality, efficiency, and competitive pricing. Known for delivering measurable results, Competent has built a reputation for excellence and trust, often earning client referrals. Focused on understanding and adapting to client requirements, Competent ensures solutions that drive growth and success.
Role Description
This is a full-time, on-site role for a Senior Mechanical BIM Engineer located in Qesm El Maadi. The role includes designing and developing mechanical systems using Computer-Aided Design (CAD), conducting regular inspections to ensure compliance with relevant standards, and managing maintenance activities to optimize system functionality. This position also involves collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and overseeing tasks related to automotive and mechanical engineering solutions.
Qualifications
Proficiency in Mechanical Engineering principles, with a proven ability to design and analyze mechanical systems
Experience with Computer-Aided Design (CAD) tools and applications
Strong skills in conducting inspections to ensure adherence to technical standards and detect issues
Knowledge and practical expertise in maintenance processes and techniques, especially in mechanical facilities
Familiarity with automotive systems and their applications
Excellent problem-solving, project management, and communication skills
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and meet project deadlines effectively
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field is required
Experience with BIM (Building Information Modeling) tools and systems is an advantage

Title: Senior Product Marketing Engineer
Description:
JOB PURPOSE
Manages and coordinates the assigned door hardware categories to meet the companyâ€™s business and operational requirements. Acts as the product and technical owner for these ranges within approved corporate and commercial frameworks.
TASKS
Manage the assigned door hardware product portfolios.
Serve as the technical reference for these products across sales, projects, and marketing functions.
Support specification activities with consultants, contractors, and project stakeholders.
Monitor market trends, standards, and competitor offerings relevant to door hardware.
Coordinate with suppliers on specifications, certifications, lead times, and product performance.
Prepare and update product documentation, catalog content, and technical presentations.
Conduct internal product training sessions and technical workshops.
Support product launches and portfolio optimization initiatives.
Collect market feedback and recommend improvements or new product introductions.
Support pricing strategy, margin analysis, and cost control initiatives.
Prepare regular product performance reports and forecasts for management.
Ensure product compliance with relevant international and local standards.
Qualifications & Experience
Bachelorâ€™s degree in engineering or a relevant technical field.
2â€“4 years of experience in product management, technical sales, or specification roles within door hardware or building materials.
Strong technical knowledge of architectural ironmongery products categories.
Experience dealing with consultants, contractors, and project-based environments is a plus.
Strong analytical, communication, and coordination skills.

Title: Senior System Administrator
Description:
Support day-to-day L2 & L3 calls on the Azure platform and Windows Server issues.
Requires participation in an on-call rotation
Take problem resolution ownership and facilitate technical bridge during operational disruption in service or service outages
Monitor events, customer support calls in the call tracking system, return calls from customers, and enter new incidents or requests into Symphony Summit AI
Manage on-premises Active Directory, Azure cloud platform, Microsoft 365 services, and VMware virtualization environments
Experience in virtualization solutions like VMware, Hyper-V & Azure VM
Experience in the Azure cloud environment to Deploy, manage, and monitor virtual machines (VMs), networks, and storage solutions within Azure.
Ensure optimal allocation of resources to meet performance requirements and cost efficiency.
Regularly apply patches and updates to Azure services and infrastructure.
Security and Compliance: Implement and maintain security policies through Microsoft 365 Defender
Hands-on experience in deploying, configuring, and managing System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM)
Qualification
(Special behavioral skills, knowledge, experience, and Education needed for the satisfactory performance of the job)
KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE:
Experience: 10 Years in Windows System Administration
Primarily Skills and Experiences:
â€¢ Administer and maintain on-premises Active Directory, Group Policies, DNS, DHCP, and related services
Administer and maintain System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM)
â€¢ Implement and manage hybrid identity solutions with Azure AD
â€¢Implement and manage Microsoft Intune (MDM/MAM)
â€¢ Manage Azure resources including VMs, networking, storage, and security configurations
Administer Microsoft 365 services (Exchange Online, SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive) and ensure compliance with organizational policies.
â€¢ Perform regular firmware assessment and upgrade.
â€¢ Coordinate with 3rd party suppliers/vendors the replacement of defective hardware on clients and servers as necessary.
â€¢ Update software and hardware inventory and documents.
â€¢ Provide scripts to automate regular tasks and jobs.
Requirements:
â€¢ Hands-on experience with VMware vSphere and its operations.
â€¢ Azure Cloud administration.
â€¢ Ability to work varying hours and shifts.
Expert knowledge of Active Directory, Azure, Microsoft 365, and VMware.
Strong understanding of networking (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VPN).
Experience with PowerShell scripting and automation.
Education: -
A bachelorâ€™s in engineering in Computer Science or Information Systems, or an equivalent combination of education and/or professional experience.

Title: SEO Linkbuilder
Description:
Company Overview
AIContentfy is a growing technology company redefining how businesses scale content through advanced AI-driven solutions. Our platform enables organizations to generate high-performing, SEO-optimized content at scale. As we continue to expand, weâ€™re building a high-performing team that matches the speed and ambition of our technology.
About the Role
Are you an expert at outreach? Do you know how to find relevant websites, reach out to them, and engage with them through different social channels?
AIContentfy is welcoming motivated SEO Linkbuilders to our team in Maadi. In this role, you will be responsible forÂ promoting our clients' content and pagesÂ to other relevant websites. Each day you will be conducting outreach through social media channels, forums, and blogs. Your commission is based on how manyÂ high-quality backlinks are receivedÂ thanks to your outreach.
Schedule:
Monday-Friday, 9am - 5pm
Salary:
10,000 - 12,000 EGP per month + commission
Location:
Maadi, Victoria Square (onsite)
Key Responsibilities
Execute daily link acquisition strategies to boost clientsâ€™ Google rankings
Reach out to bloggers, publishers, and website owners to secure high-quality backlinks
Reach out to link donors through email, social media, forums, or other channels as necessary
Track outreach campaigns through email, social media, and other communication channels
Provide recommendations to our Content and SEO teams in how we can improve our chances of gaining high-quality backlinks
Qualifications
Bachelorâ€™s degree required
English Fluency (B2+)
Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines.
Familiarity with link building and SEO tools (e.g., Ahrefs, SEMrush) is a plus
Completion or exemption of military service, if applicable
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Receptive to feedback and motivated to improve
Benefits & Compensation
Base salary + commission
Complimentary snacks & refreshments available on-site.
Opportunities for professional growth and skill development.
Collaboration with industry leaders in AI and digital marketing.
Join our team at AIContentfy and use your communication skills to build connections and execute strategies. Apply now and be part of our innovative journey!

Title: Purchase to Pay Specialist (One Year Contract - French Speaker)
Description:
About this Position
The position is part of the Global Business Solution in Cairo (GBS+ Cairo), in the Source to Pay Process specifically handling the operation of Purchase to Pay Specialist.
What YouÂ´ll Do
Post incoming invoices in regards with purchase orders created.
Checking the invoice data input to ensure the accuracy of the final posting.
Respond to vendor queries related to invoicing and payments.
Implement invoice verifications controls to ensure quality.
Conducts monthly reconciliations on vendor accounts and perform regular clearing.
Supports and implements Continuous Process Improvements
What makes you a good fit
Bachelor's degree in business administration, Accounting, or Finance.
Max 1 year experience in Purchase to pay or accounts payable or any relevant fields.
Fluent English & French speaker with excellent communication skills both in written and verbal.
Proficient user of Microsoft Office applications
Strong & proactive problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively about stakeholder satisfaction.
Some perks of joining Henkel
Flexible work scheme with flexible hours, hybrid work model, and work from anywhere policy for up to 30 days per year
Diverse national and international growth opportunities
Global wellbeing standards with health and preventive care programs
Gender-neutral parental leave for a minimum of 8 weeks
Employee Share Plan with voluntary investment and Henkel matching shares
Comprehensive Health Insurance for employee + dependents
Employee Assistance Programme provides a wide range of mental health and wellbeing benefits
At Henkel, we come from a broad range of backgrounds, perspectives, and life experiences. We believe the uniqueness of all our employees is the power in us. Become part of the team and bring your uniqueness to us! We look for a diverse team of individuals who possess different backgrounds, experiences, personalities and mindsets.

Title: Automation Test Lead
Description:
Role Summary
We are looking for an experienced
Automation Test Lead
with
8+ years of experience
in software quality assurance and test automation. The role involves leading automation strategy, designing scalable test frameworks, mentoring QA engineers, and ensuring high-quality releases across web and API platforms using tools such as
Playwright and Selenium
.
Key Responsibilities
Lead the
test automation strategy
, roadmap, and execution across projects
Design, develop, and maintain
robust automation frameworks
using
Playwright, Selenium, and related tools
Define automation standards, best practices, and coding guidelines
Review test scripts, ensure reusability, scalability, and maintainability
Collaborate closely with
developers, product owners, and DevOps teams
Integrate automation suites with
CI/CD pipelines
Analyze test results, identify quality risks, and drive defect resolution
Mentor and guide automation and manual QA engineers
Participate in
test planning, estimation, and release readiness activities
Ensure adequate test coverage across
UI, API, regression, and performance tests
Required Skills & Experience
8+ years
of experience in Software Testing / QA Automation
Strong hands-on experience with
Playwright and Selenium
Proficiency in at least one programming language (Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, or C#)
Solid understanding of
test automation frameworks
and design patterns
Experience with
API testing
(Postman, Rest Assured, or similar tools)
Strong knowledge of
CI/CD tools
(Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.)
Experience with
version control systems
(Git)
Strong understanding of SDLC, STLC, and Agile/Scrum methodologies
Proven experience leading or mentoring QA teams
Nice to Have
Experience with
BDD frameworks
(Cucumber, SpecFlow)
Exposure to
performance testing tools
(JMeter, Gatling, etc.)
Experience with
cloud environments
(AWS, Azure, GCP)
ISTQB or other QA certifications

Title: Data Warehouse Senior Consultant - Remote - Octopus by RTG
Description:
About Octopus By RTG
Octopus by RTG is the tech hiring and outsourcing arm of
Robusta Technology Group
, dedicated to connecting exceptional tech talent with top-tier organizations across the
MENA, GCC, Europe, the US, and Canada
. We specialize in building strong, long-term partnerships between skilled professionals and innovative companies. Our mission is to
empower growth, innovation, and excellence
by matching the right talent with the right opportunities.
Currently, we are hiring a
Data Warehouse Senior Consultant
for one of our
partner organizations in KSA
, offering the opportunity to contribute to exciting projects within a dynamic and forward-thinking environment.
Job Purpose
The Data Warehouse Senior Consultant is responsible for overseeing, coordinating, and supporting the implementation and operation of the organization's enterprise Data Warehouse built on Microsoft Fabric. The platform leverages Data Factory, Synapse, and Power BI for data integration, modeling, and visualization. This role ensures effective collaboration with external implementation vendors, validates solution design, and builds internal data capabilities through knowledge transfer during the project phase. After implementation, the role will manage ongoing operations, governance, and performance of the Data Warehouse.
Key Responsibilities
Manage and coordinate day-to-day activities with the external vendor implementing the Data Warehouse solution
Participate in designing data architecture, models, and integration processes using Microsoft Fabric components
Oversee ETL/ELT processes and data ingestion pipelines, ensuring data consistency and quality
Ensure proper integration between source systems (e.g., CRM, ERP, Finance, HR, Contact Center systems) and the Data Warehouse
Collaborate with business stakeholders to define KPIs, metrics, and reporting requirements
Ensure data governance, security, and compliance standards are followed
Document data mappings, lineage, and architecture diagrams
Manage and optimize performance, monitoring, and capacity planning post go-live
Conduct knowledge transfer sessions to empower internal data and analytics teams
Act as the organization's subject matter expert for Data Warehousing and Microsoft Fabric platform operations
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Data Science, or Software Engineering
5+ years of experience in Data Warehousing, ETL, or Business Intelligence projects
Strong hands-on experience with Microsoft Fabric tools (Data Factory, Synapse, Power BI)
Preferred certifications: Microsoft Certified Data Engineer Associate or Fabric Analytics Engineer
Solid understanding of data modeling, governance, and integration principles
Proven experience working with external vendors and managing data implementation projects
Excellent analytical, documentation, and communication skills
Fluent in Arabic and English

Title: MuleSoft Senior Consultant - Remote - Octopus
Description:
About Octopus By RTG
Octopus by RTG is the tech hiring and outsourcing arm of
Robusta Technology Group
, dedicated to connecting exceptional tech talent with top-tier organizations across the
MENA, GCC, Europe, the US, and Canada
. We specialize in building strong, long-term partnerships between skilled professionals and innovative companies. Our mission is to
empower growth, innovation, and excellence
by matching the right talent with the right opportunities.
Currently, we are hiring a MuleSoft Senior Consultant for one of our
partner organizations in KSA
, offering the opportunity to contribute to exciting projects within a dynamic and forward-thinking environment.
The
MuleSoft Senior Consultant
is responsible for managing, coordinating, and supporting the implementation and ongoing operation of Theeb's integration platform based on
MuleSoft Anypoint Platform
.
This role ensures effective collaboration with external implementation partners, oversees system integrations (including
CarPro, Salesforce, and Genesys
), and supports the establishment of internal capabilities for long-term platform ownership and sustainability.
Main Responsibilities
Oversee and coordinate all MuleSoft integration activities in collaboration with the external implementation vendor.
Review, validate, and document API designs, integration architecture, and deployment processes.
Ensure API governance, standardization, security, and best practices are consistently applied across integrations.
Collaborate with business stakeholders and technical teams to define integration requirements, priorities, and roadmaps.
Monitor, support, and optimize integrations between CarPro, Salesforce, Genesys, and other enterprise systems.
Conduct technical reviews, troubleshoot integration issues, and ensure adherence to SLAs and performance standards.
Prepare and maintain technical documentation, interface catalogs, and integration performance reports.
Support internal knowledge transfer initiatives to build and strengthen Theeb's in-house integration capabilities.
Act as the subject matter expert (SME) for API-led connectivity, middleware architecture, and MuleSoft operations
Requirements
Education
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Experience & Technical Skills
5+ years of experience in system integration, middleware, or enterprise integration roles.
Strong hands-on experience with MuleSoft Anypoint Platform, including:
Design Center
API Manager
Runtime Manager
Solid understanding of REST, SOAP, JSON, XML, and integration security protocols (OAuth, JWT, TLS).
Proven experience coordinating with external vendors and managing complex integration initiatives.
Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.
Excellent documentation, communication, and stakeholder management capabilities.
Certifications (Preferred)
MuleSoft Certified Developer
MuleSoft Certified Integration Architect
Language Requirements
Fluent in Arabic and English (spoken and written)

Title: Spanish Voice Actor - Freelance AI Trainer Project
Description:
Are you an experienced Spanish voice actor eager to shape the future of AI? Large-scale language models and speech technologies are evolving rapidly, moving beyond simple interactions into expressive, human-like communication. With high-quality training data, tomorrowâ€™s AI can deliver more natural, accurate, and engaging voice experiences across education, entertainment, accessibility, and beyond. That training data begins with youâ€”your voice expertise will help power the next generation of AI.
Weâ€™re looking for a highly skilled Spanish voice acting professional who can bring nuance, clarity, and authenticity to training data. Youâ€™ll work with cutting-edge AI tools, record and evaluate Spanish speech samples, and provide expert feedback on pronunciation, tone, pacing, and emotional expression to strengthen voice models.
On a typical day, you will record scripted material, assess AI-generated outputs for linguistic accuracy and naturalness, annotate errors, and collaborate with our team to refine prompts, evaluation methods, and voice design guidelines.
Fluency in Spanish is required, along with demonstrated experience in professional voice acting, dubbing, narration, or related performance work. Experience in training, coaching, or linguistic annotation is a plus. Clear communication skills and attention to detail are essential. A high-quality recording setupâ€”including a reliable microphone and a quiet environmentâ€”is required.
Ready to channel your Spanish voice expertise into building the AI voices of tomorrow? Apply today and help shape the model that will speak to millions around the world.
We offer a pay range of $6 to $65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. Final offer amounts may vary from the pay range listed above. As a contractor youâ€™ll supply a secure computer, high-quality microphone and recording setup, and stable internet connection; company-sponsored benefits such as health insurance and PTO do not apply.
Job title: Spanish Voice Acting Specialist â€“ AI Trainer
Employment type: Contract
Workplace type: Remote
Seniority level: Mid-Senior

Title: Sales Professional
Description:
Company Description
Egygate Marketing Agency is a full-service marketing and advertising company that offers a wide range of marketing solutions, including printing and social media marketing services. We are dedicated to supporting marketers and business owners by delivering impactful marketing strategies. Egygate also provides valuable content and resources to help businesses thrive in their industries. With a focus on creativity and innovation, we aim to be a trusted partner in achieving business growth.
Role Description
This is a full-time, on-site position based in Qesm 2nd Tanta for a Sales Representative at Egygate Marketing Agency. The candidate will be responsible for identifying and contacting potential clients, building and maintaining client relationships, and offering marketing services tailored to the needs of business owners. Responsibilities include scheduling and attending meetings, presenting marketing solutions, negotiating contracts, and contributing to the sales team's goals by meeting measurable KPIs.
Qualifications
Strong interpersonal and communication skills to build and maintain client relationships
Experience in sales and an understanding of marketing services, including social media marketing and printing solutions
Strong organizational and time-management skills to meet sales targets and deadlines
Proficiency in negotiation and deal closure processes
Ability to work effectively in an on-site environment
Demonstrated problem-solving skills and a customer-centric approach
Proficiency in CRM software and other relevant tools is a plus
Previous experience in the marketing or advertising industry is desirable

Title: BIM Structure Engineer
Description:
Role Purpose
We are seeking a skilled
BIM Structure Engineer
to join our construction team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and managing Building Information Modeling (BIM) for structural elements of construction projects. This role requires a deep understanding of structural engineering principles and expertise in BIM tools such as Revit, Navisworks, and AutoCAD.
Key Accountabilities
Develop and manage 3D structural models using BIM software.
Coordinate with architectural, MEP, and construction teams for integrated BIM delivery.
Interpret and apply structural drawings, specifications, and standards.
Perform clash detection and resolve conflicts in coordination with other disciplines.
Generate accurate structural shop drawings, BOQs, and schedules from BIM models.
Support the implementation and enforcement of BIM standards and protocols.
Update models to reflect design changes or site conditions.
Participate in BIM coordination meetings and provide technical input.
Ensure model accuracy and quality control at various project stages.
Qualifications, Experience, Knowledge & Skills
Bachelor's degree in Structural Engineering, Civil Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum 3â€“5 years of experience in a similar role within the construction industry.
Proficiency in BIM software (Revit Structure, Navisworks, AutoCAD, etc.).
Strong understanding of structural engineering concepts and detailing.
Familiarity with BIM standards (e.g., ISO 19650) and workflows.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Title: Customer Care Representative
Description:
This is a full-time on-site role for a Customer Support Representative, located in Cairo, Egypt.
The Customer Support Representative, will interact with customers to provide assistance and support for various products and services, addressing inquiries and resolving issues effectively.
This role involves handling billing support requests, ensuring customer satisfaction, and utilizing analytical skills to troubleshoot problems.
The successful candidate will maintain a high level of professionalism and interpersonal skills to foster positive customer relationships.
Job Requirements
B2-C1 English Level
Flexibility with night and overnight shifts
Graduates and Dropouts
Benefits
Competitive Salary
Social and Medical Insurance
Training fully paid and KPIs granted for first 3 months
Overnight Allowance, Bonuses and Incentives
Transportation provided 24/7
If interested, Apply on: 01017450060

Title: SC QC Associate - CoMan
Description:
Overview
Perform Water treatment, syrup, on-line testing and finished product SAP virtual activities.
Responsibilities
Perform quality control tests and record results on treated and untreated water as per MCP.

Perform all QC checks to ensure syrup batches compliance to the quality standard.
Perform routine analytical on-line testing in compliance with the predetermined sampling plan to ensure that finished beverage product meets quality standards.
Monitors and records Brix, CO2, Acidity (TA) and net content as required and make proper adjustment as necessary to ensure product quality within Pepsi specifications
Running proportioning equipment (mixers) and maintaining accurate records
Monitors and records All test, packaging, empty bottles tests and physio analysis Brix, CO2 , Acidity (TA) and net content as required and make proper adjustment as necessary to ensure product quality within Pepsi specifications
Perform necessary adjustments to product batches and other processes when out of normal operating conditions are experienced.
Test finished product and final package for quality parameters. Analyze and respond to results as needed. Initiate root cause analysis with team members to identify and implement corrective action
Use analytical instrumentation such as Carbo-QC, Densitometer, pH meter, Refractometer, Torque tester, secure seal tester, etc
Logging and tracking of on-line samples testing
Place all products and packages that fall outside quality ranges on hold for further testing or review
Lead lines sanitation and deep cleaning duties as needed and ensures proper sanitation and cleaning of production lines before start up and during production
Ensure micro samples are pulled and plated on all production lines after full sanitation "5 steps CIP"
Meet plant agreed quality targets related to production lines based on CORK monthly G3D results
Verification on manufacturing KPIs
Ensure safe operation in his area of concern.
Ensure producing safe products and applying key food safety attributes in his area of concern.
Assume other duties as assigned by area management
Ensure treated water parameter is complying PepsiCo stander
Finish Good transfer to virtual warehouse and Pepsico DCâ€™s
Ensure receiving raw and pack materials as per standard.
Qualifications
Bsc. degree in science or agriculture from recognized university.
0 to 2 years experience in quality operations, in field of food industries will be an added value.
Strong communication skills
Handling multitasks at the same time.
Ability to work under stress
Good command on MS package
Acceptable written and spoken English
Ability to make quick decisions and work in a fast-paced environment
Basic understanding of a laboratory environment
Ability to work nights and weekends
Industries: Manufacturing and Food and Beverage Services

Title: French Voice Actor - Freelance AI Trainer Project
Description:
Are you an experienced French voice actor eager to shape the future of AI? Large-scale language models and speech technologies are evolving rapidly, moving beyond simple interactions into expressive, human-like communication. With high-quality training data, tomorrowâ€™s AI can deliver more natural, accurate, and engaging voice experiences across education, entertainment, accessibility, and beyond. That training data begins with youâ€”your voice expertise will help power the next generation of AI.

Fluency in French is required, along with demonstrated experience in professional voice acting, dubbing, narration, or related performance work. Experience in training, coaching, or linguistic annotation is a plus. Clear communication skills and attention to detail are essential. A high-quality recording setupâ€”including a reliable microphone and a quiet environmentâ€”is required.
Ready to channel your French voice expertise into building the AI voices of tomorrow? Apply today and help shape the model that will speak to millions around the world.
We offer a pay range of $6 to $65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. Final offer amounts may vary from the pay range listed above. Title: Hindi Voice Actor - Freelance AI Trainer Project
Description:
Are you an experienced Hindi voice actor eager to shape the future of AI? Large-scale language models and speech technologies are evolving rapidly, moving beyond simple interactions into expressive, human-like communication. With high-quality training data, tomorrowâ€™s AI can deliver more natural, accurate, and engaging voice experiences across education, entertainment, accessibility, and beyond. That training data begins with youâ€”your voice expertise will help power the next generation of AI.
Weâ€™re looking for a highly skilled Hindi voice acting professional who can bring nuance, clarity, and authenticity to training data. Youâ€™ll work with cutting-edge AI tools, record and evaluate Hindi speech samples, and provide expert feedback on pronunciation, tone, pacing, and emotional expression to strengthen voice models.
On a typical day, you will record scripted material, assess AI-generated outputs for linguistic accuracy and naturalness, annotate errors, and collaborate with our team to refine prompts, evaluation methods, and voice design guidelines.
Fluency in Hindi is required, along with demonstrated experience in professional voice acting, dubbing, narration, or related performance work. Experience in training, coaching, or linguistic annotation is a plus. Clear communication skills and attention to detail are essential. A high-quality recording setupâ€”including a reliable microphone and a quiet environmentâ€”is required.
Ready to channel your Hindi voice expertise into building the AI voices of tomorrow? Apply today and help shape the model that will speak to millions around the world.
We offer a pay range of $6 to $65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. Final offer amounts may vary from the pay range listed above. As a contractor youâ€™ll supply a secure computer, high-quality microphone and recording setup, and stable internet connection; company-sponsored benefits such as health insurance and PTO do not apply.
Job title: Hindi Voice Acting Specialist â€“ AI Trainer
Employment type: Contract
Workplace type: Remote
Seniority level: Mid-Senior

Title: Media Buyer & Performance Lead "E-Commerce"
Description:
What weâ€™re looking for
We are looking for experienced and analytically performance media specialist with a passion for getting into the numbers to identify how to turn visitors into customers, and gets a kick out of delivering great results. Youâ€™ll already be running brand, social, video and performance display / PPC campaigns and have a robust understanding of how peopleâ€™s online behaviors and triggers. Weâ€™re looking for someone who wants to help us change consumer behavior in the digital economy.
You appreciate the role of both digital and traditional media, and know how to manage campaigns across both. Your proven ability to deliver quality work, quickly, will see you succeed in our fast-paced and lean business environment.
You will be
â— A member of the local marketing team, providing advice on media performance.
â— As the performance media specialist, youâ€™ll own the budget, investment strategies and outcomes.
â— Interested in how your work contributes to our lead generation activities and supports our sales and services team to bring on and retain new customers.
â— Working with the site team to develop new ways to better land people on site to maximize conversion, across all your inbound channels of responsibility.
â— Responsible for ensuring business leadership know where our investment is driving results and where youâ€™re making changes to improve outcomes.
Every day youâ€™re
â— Managing campaign performance, optimizing key terms and buying / bidding strategies to improve our conversion ratios.
â— Getting stuck in Google Analytics and internal data to learn more about how your work influences traffic to, and through, the site.
â— Using search, performance, and business data to inform your decision-making processes.
â— Testing out different buying and bid strategies to maintain growth, while actively working to keep our investment costs optimized.
â— Briefing and managing development of new advertising creative for use in non-search environments.
â— Continually testing new ad copy / digital creative and providing recommendations to the site management team for trial on site.
â— Listening to customer calls to understand where content can be created to meet customersâ€™ needs for simple and clear information about insurance, claims, and more.
Job Requirements
â—
E-commerce background is a must
â—
5+ yearsâ€™ experience in media or performance marketing agency, or within a digitally-led B2C business â€œGCC is a mustâ€
.
â— Hands-on experience in setting up, running and optimizing paid search campaigns using Google Ads and bid-automation tool (i.e. SA 360, Kenshoo, Marin); a Google Ads Professional Certified and Search Ads 360 Certified (a bonus)
â— Ensure campaigns are optimized regularly and deliver campaign performance based on KPIs set. Knowledge of ad trafficking, tracking, analysis and reporting.
â— Can demonstrate how to drive new customer acquisition and brand communications.
â— Experience in Display Programmatic and Social Media Advertising.
â— Working knowledge of Googleâ€™s full stack including Analytics, Google Marketing Platform (Double Click).
â— High level of experience managing digital media investment.
â— Comfortable working on big dataset through Excel or SQL (not a must) in the process of analyzing campaign results.
â— Independent, proactive and organized with excellent time management skills.
Industries: IT Services and IT Consulting and Financial Services

Title: Senior Marketing Executive
Description:
Job Title: Senior Marketing Executive
Department: Marketing
Reports To: Founder & CEO
â¸»
1. Job Purpose
The Senior Marketing Executive is responsible for planning and executing daily marketing activities for Dr Secret across online and offline channels, with a focus on driving sales, building brand awareness, and using budget-friendly digital tools.
â¸»
2. Main Responsibilities
A. Marketing Planning & Coordination
â€¢ Prepare monthly and seasonal marketing plans and simple campaign calendars.
â€¢ Coordinate with branches, designers, and agencies to implement campaigns.
B. Digital & Social Media Marketing
â€¢ Manage brand social media accounts (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok).
â€¢ Plan and schedule posts, stories, and Reels based on the marketing calendar.
â€¢ Support in running paid ads (Meta, TikTok, Google) and follow up on basic performance.
C. Content & Brand Communication
â€¢ Write and review captions, ads, and simple website texts (Arabic + basic English).
â€¢ Maintain a consistent brand tone and visual style.
â€¢ Suggest creative content ideas (new arrivals, sets, gifting, behind the scenes, etc.).
D. E-Commerce & CRM Support
â€¢ Coordinate product uploads, descriptions, and promotions on the website.
â€¢ Assist in WhatsApp, SMS, or email campaigns to promote offers and new collections.
â€¢ Help maintain a simple customer database for remarketing and loyalty.
E. Retail & In-Store Marketing Support
â€¢ Align in-store promotions with online campaigns.
â€¢ Coordinate in-store marketing materials (posters, price tags, offers).
F. Monitoring & Reporting
â€¢ Prepare weekly and monthly summaries of key marketing results (followers, engagement, campaign outcomes).
â€¢ Monitor competitor brands and share ideas for improvement.
â¸»
3. Qualifications
â€¢ Bachelorâ€™s degree in Marketing, Business, Media, or related field.
â€¢ 3â€“5 years of experience in marketing, preferably in fashion, retail, or e-commerce.
â€¢ Practical experience in social media management and basic paid advertising.
â€¢ Good command of Arabic and basic English (writing and reading).
â¸»
4. Skills & Competencies
â€¢ Strong planning and organization.
â€¢ Good copywriting skills in Arabic.
â€¢ Basic understanding of digital marketing metrics (reach, CTR, ROAS, etc.).
â€¢ Ability to brief and coordinate with designers and photographers.
â€¢ High attention to brand details and consistency.
â€¢ Results-focused and able to work with limited budgets.
â€¢ Good communication with different departments (retail, factory, finance).
Industry
Retail Apparel and Fashion

Title: Social Media Marketing Specialist
Description:
Company Description
Sam3nyevents is a full-service event management firm based in sherouk Cairo, Egypt, dedicated to blending a passion for business, art, and events. Known for crafting unique and impactful experiences, Sam3nyevents specializes in creating memorable occasions tailored to client needs. The company takes pride in delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service. By combining creativity with meticulous planning, Sam3nyevents serves as a trusted partner in orchestrating remarkable events.
Role Description
The Social Media Marketing Specialist is a full-time, on-site role based in Qesm El Sherouk. Responsibilities include managing and executing social media strategies to enhance brand visibility and engagement. The specialist will create and curate content for social media platforms, implement digital marketing campaigns, and analyze performance metrics to optimize results. Collaboration with internal teams to align social media efforts with overall marketing goals is also a key part of the role.
Qualifications
Strong proficiency in Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, and Digital Marketing
Marketing and Communication skills to effectively engage with diverse audiences
Experience with social media platforms and tools to execute successful campaigns
Knowledge of current digital trends and best practices
Creative mindset with strong attention to detail
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field is preferred
Previous experience in event management or a related industry is an advantage

Title: Logistics Specialist - Portsaid
Description:
Trans Business for Trading and Distribution "the Solo Distributor of Philip Morris Products in Egypt" is looking for
Logistics Specialist
in Portsaid
Responsibilities
Follow-up the procedures of receiving the original documents for air and sea freights from Philip Morris Egypt.
Issue form 4 for air freight shipments and send the documents to the custom clearance.
Responsible for all customs clearance process including following up with the governmental authorities.
Responsible for for purchasing, receiving and shipping the bandrol stamps.
Responsible for the final settlement for each bandrol stamp shipment separately.
Determined the missing bandrol stamps to pay its taxes and customs fees.
Follow-up the amendments issued to the tax or customs laws that affect directly or indirectly the customs release procedures.
Prepare daily progress reports showing the progress.
Qualifications
Bachelor's Degree in any discipline
2-4 years of experience in similar role
Highly analytical skills and details oriented
Fluent in English
